channel.title: Trust Ranks-UnityDicing-New IRC for RS gambling-Hiring Hosts-Free 1M pot to 5
channel.description:
PHOTO BELOW OF OUR GAMES OFFERED! COME GIVE US A TRY AT #Unitycity IRC! [URL=http://s747.photobucket.com/user/Carloshenao6_2010/media/0ejCLo5_zpsa95361fc.png.html][IMG]http://i747.photobucket.com/albums/xx113/Carloshenao6_2010/0ejCLo5_zpsa95361fc.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s747.photobucket.com/user/Carloshenao6_2010/media/ScreenShot2014-12-29at95023PM_zps12d200dc.png.html][IMG]http://i747.photobucket.com/albums/xx113/Carloshenao6_2010/ScreenShot2014-12-29at95023PM_zps12d200dc.png[/img][/URL]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hey guys Darkpk here, I have finally gotten together with one of my friends, Unitycity and we are going to be launching our IRC gambling group today. I am offering a free 1m EOC Pot to the first 5 to come and try out our games. We have alot of work to do in our IRC and we will be working hard on our website unitycity . org where we will hold raffles and various other competitions to win ingame gold :)
Currently we have: -Hot or Cold -60x2 or 55x2 Percentile Dicing -Classic Dice dueling vs Host or another player. -ABC Flowers -Flower Poker -Frosty Flowers -Blackjack
Currently we are hiring hosts, which will be paying a certain amount for a rank, that way if anyone is scammed, we will be paying the people their pot back :) If anyone is interested in getting a rank please join our IRC and msg me, XPK or add my skype: Deathknight50
Currently there are only 2 hosts, XPK and KJ8. Hosts will have an @ or % by their name and those are the only people you are supposed to be on. We will soon be posting max/mins once we have hired a few hosts. Currently our prices to host are a bit discounted as we are in need of a few hosts. We will be accepting EOC/07 gold just message us.
To go straight to our irc use this link: [url=http://qwebirc.swiftirc.net/?channels=unitycity&uio=MTE9Mjg353]http://qwebirc.swiftirc.net/?channels=unitycity&uio=MTE9Mjg353[/url] Or join through swiftirc using #unitycity
Look forward to seeing some betters soon :) Don't forget to query a host for a location to bet and that the first 5 betters will get a free 1m pot :D
Thanks and look forward to seeing you guys soon :)[/color]

Hey guys Darkpk here, I have finally gotten together with one of my friends, Unitycity and we are going to be launching our IRC gambling group today.
I am offering a free 1m EOC Pot to the first 5 to come and try out our games.
We have alot of work to do in our IRC and we will be working hard on our website unitycity . org where we will hold raffles and various other competitions to win ingame gold

Currently we have:
-Hot or Cold
-60x2 or 55x2 Percentile Dicing
-Classic Dice dueling vs Host or another player.
-ABC Flowers
-Flower Poker
-Frosty Flowers
-Blackjack

Currently we are hiring hosts, which will be paying a certain amount for a rank, that way if anyone is scammed, we will be paying the people their pot back
If anyone is interested in getting a rank please join our IRC and msg me, XPK
or add my skype: Deathknight50

Currently there are only 2 hosts, XPK and KJ8.
Hosts will have an @ or % by their name and those are the only people you are supposed to be on. We will soon be posting max/mins once we have hired a few hosts. Currently our prices to host are a bit discounted as we are in need of a few hosts. We will be accepting EOC/07 gold just message us.

To go straight to our irc use this link:
http://qwebirc.swiftirc.net/?channels=unitycity&uio=MTE9Mjg353
Or join through swiftirc using #unitycity

Look forward to seeing some betters soon Donâ€™t forget to query a host for a location to bet and that the first 5 betters will get a free 1m pot
